name: The Sims 3 Game Save Backup File

description: If you have a corrupt SIMS3 file that does not load, you can restore the game from your SIMS3.BACKUP file.

common_filenames.description: [name of your game].sims3.backup - The filename created in your "Saves" folder for the The Sims 3 game you're playing when you save your game.
